articles.title: Struggling military families ask Globe Santa for help
articles.description:
"When one person serves, the whole family serves."

The post Struggling military families ask Globe Santa for help appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Military families in Boston seek assistance from Globe Santa for holiday support.
Over 200 families have applied for help this year, highlighting increased need.
Local donations are crucial to ensure these families receive necessary holiday aid.

articles.title: Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about Tuesday’s wind chill, potential for flurries
articles.description:
"Unseasonably cold & windy today with a few brief passing flurries or snow showers possible," the National Weather Service reported.

The post Here’s what Boston meteorologists are saying about Tuesday’s wind chill, potential for flurries appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston faces unseasonably cold temperatures and strong winds on Tuesday.
National Weather Service predicts brief flurries or snow showers throughout the day.
Residents should prepare for wind chill factors making temperatures feel even colder.

articles.title: Love Letters notes on Veterans Day
articles.description:
We’re taking the day off for the observed holiday. A few things: Next week is Globe Summit. Elin Hilderbrand fans: if you want to be in the audience at a special Globe event with Elin and me, talking about books, right now is the time to send a letter. Tell all your book club friends, etc. To […]

The post Love Letters notes on Veterans Day appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Globe observes Veterans Day with a day off on November 11.
Elin Hilderbrand fans can submit letters for a special event next week.
Community engagement encouraged through book club participation in upcoming Globe Summit.

articles.title: Jets’ Garrett Wilson being evaluated after reinjuring knee, uncertain for Thursday night vs. Patriots
articles.description:
ESPN reported Wilson has a sprained knee and could be sidelined for three to four weeks.

The post Jets’ Garrett Wilson being evaluated after reinjuring knee, uncertain for Thursday night vs. Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jets' Garrett Wilson reinjured his knee and is being evaluated for recovery.
Wilson has a sprained knee and may miss three to four weeks.
His absence could impact the Patriots' game strategy on November 16.

articles.title: Shutdown leaves a mark on an already-struggling economy, from lost paychecks to canceled flights
articles.description:
Airlines scrapped more than 2,000 flights by Monday evening after canceling 5,500 since Friday on orders from the Federal Aviation Administration.

The post Shutdown leaves a mark on an already-struggling economy, from lost paychecks to canceled flights appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Airlines canceled over 5,500 flights since Friday due to the government shutdown.
More than 2,000 flights were scrapped by Monday evening, affecting Boston travelers.
Local economy suffers as residents face lost paychecks and disrupted travel plans.
